text: Ethan Terence Jolley (born 29 March 1997) is a Gibraltarian footballer who plays as a defender for Europa and the Gibraltar national team. He is the cousin of Tjay De Barr who also plays as a striker for the Gibraltar national team and Real Oviedo ==Career== Jolley made his international debut for Gibraltar on 26 March 2019, coming on as a substitute for Tjay De Barr in second-half stoppage time of the friendly match against Estonia, which finished as a 0–1 home loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Gibraltar |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||4||0 |- |2020||2||0 |- !Total!!6!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Gibraltarian footballers Category:Gibraltar youth international footballers Category:Gibraltar under-21 international footballers Category:Gibraltar international footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Europa F.C. players Category:Lincoln Red Imps F.C. players Category:Lynx F.C. players Category:Mons Calpe S.C. players Category:Gibraltar Premier Division players
title: Ethan Jolley
